ghost.title: Pathway - The Python Framework That Keeps Your AI From Working With Stale Data
ghost.custom_excerpt: Pathway is a high-performance Python ETL framework for stream processing and real-time AI pipelines.
ghost.html:
Finally, a Way to Feed Live Data Into AI

The project Pathway solves the problem of keeping AI systems updated with fresh data in real-time.

This matters because we're rushing to deploy AI agents that make real decisions.

The Problem We All Know Too Well

Here's the current state: you build a beautiful RAG system. You index your documents, generate embeddings, store them in a vector database, and everything works perfectly. Then reality hits.
